creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
after visiting a toplevel node (authoring,trash,archive) and then open subnodes
with the plus-icon and choosing a document, there are 2 slashes before the
documentid instead of one slash.

text:
applied it to 1.2.X

Can this also be applied to 1.4.X ?

Michi

creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
simon.litwan@wyona.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 34709 ***

i can confirm the behaviour with current trunk. it's not really an important
issue, since it does not seem to cause any misbehaviour, but it should be fixed.
i tried to diff simon's attachment against the current 1.4 version, but the
differences were huge, so i could not figure what the fix was... simon, can you
rememember? fwiw, it's always best to attach diffs, not entire files, so that
half-brained fellows like me can easily grasp the core of the problem...
creator: nettings@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: I can't reproduce this in the trunk, I guess it has been fixed.
